column1: #Text=Katara says : " Do they have bathrooms in the Spirit World ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " As a matter of fact , they do not . "
#Text=Aang says : " Hey , we 're almost at the Southern Air Temple ! "
#Text=Roku says : " This was the first stop on my Avatar journey . "
#Text=Roku says : " It was the place where I was trained to master airbending . "
